mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_event (employee_id, eve_class, eve_subject, eve_date, eve_amount) VALUES (#{employee_id}, #{eve_class}, #{eve_subject}, #{eve_date}, #{eve_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT eve_class, eve_subject, eve_date, req_date, eve_auth FROM tbl_event WHERE employee_id=#{employee_id} AND ${search} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY req_date DESC
